alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Guilford; Lee; Moore; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Moore, eastern Randolph, southwestern Guilford, northwestern Lee and southwestern Chatham Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of High Point to 7 miles southwest of Siler City to near Goldston. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, High Point, Sanford, Asheboro, Randleman, Siler City, North Carolina Zoo, Goldston, Archdale and Pleasant Garden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
